title: Add Iran to Devs Account Registration
body:
Please , Add Iran to your supported countries list in Developer Account Registration.
We'll develop great apps for Windows Store.

comments.body: Hi. There are many developers who are waiting for you to allow us to register for developer account. Please do us this favor.

This is racism, politics have nothing to do with technology, our government is not building apps for you, we people are. I'm gonna show the world how racist technology companies like Microsoft are, don't tell me that America's government is forcing you to ban us, you just hate us. I am truly sorry for myself to comment here and ask you this, but it's just Iran is **** and I have to
Hi. There are many developers who are waiting for you to allow us to register for developer account. Please do us this favor.
Please Add Iran as soon as possible...
